text:
Hi there
  `{% set current_month = "August" %}`
    `{% set months = [`
        `"January", "February", "March", "April",`
        `"May", "June", "July", "August",`
        `"September", "October", "November", "December"`
    `] %}`

    `{% for month in range(months.index("August")) %}`
        `<p>{{ months[month] }}</p>`
    `{% endfor %}`


This code would print for months till July
You can add 1 to the range output

Hello everyone

How can I fetch product associated with this content in my marketing Email
